game.title: The Quest for the Eternal明珠
game.description: A quest of great significance, you must traverse enchanted forests, decipher ancient prophecies, and confront powerful guardians to unlock the artifact's secrets. Your success holds the key to eternal peace.

task.description: Head to the Celestial Library, hidden deep within the Cloud Peaks, and obtain the Codex that holds the key to the ancient key's location.

task.objective: Solve the riddles of the Star Guardians
task.description: In the library's heart, face the guardians of the stars and unravel their cryptic messages to progress.
The moon holds a labyrinth that tests your cunning. Outsmart its twisting passages and overcome lunar beasts to reach the next clue.
The final challenge lies before you: defeat the Celestial Guardian who guards the artifact's resting place.
